name: COMMERCIAL_WEEKDAY
description: Typical commercial office building load profile for a weekday
notes: Peak load occurs during business hours (10 AM - 2 PM)
Morning ramp-up from 7-9 AM as HVAC systems pre-cool buildings
Sustained high load from 9 AM - 5 PM (business hours)
Evening ramp-down after 5 PM as offices close
Nighttime base load maintains HVAC setback and security systems
Based on typical office building load patterns
